meanings.definition: The quality of being extensive in scope or range.
meanings.sent1: The extensivenesses of the forest amazed the hikers with its vastness.
meanings.sent2: The report's extensivenesses covered every aspect of the project.
meanings.sent3: The extensivenesses of the buffet left everyone happily full.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge had an extensivenesses that seemed to have no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The extensivenesses of the library's collection was a book lover's dream.

meanings.definition: The state of having a large amount of something.
meanings.sent1: The extensivenesses of the crowd made it hard to find her friend.
meanings.sent2: His extensivenesses of tools in the garage impressed his neighbors.
meanings.sent3: The extensivenesses of her shoe collection was a bit overwhelming.
meanings.sent4: The extensivenesses of the menu at the restaurant delighted foodies.
meanings.sent5: The extensivenesses of the desert's sand dunes stretched as far as the eye could see.

meanings.definition: The extent or degree to which something is extensive.
meanings.sent1: The extensivenesses of the damage caused by the storm was shocking.
meanings.sent2: She was surprised by the extensivenesses of the renovation project.
meanings.sent3: The extensivenesses of his collection of stamps was a hobby turned obsession.
meanings.sent4: The extensivenesses of the mountain range took their breath away.
meanings.sent5: The extensivenesses of the artist's portfolio showcased incredible talent.
